code: import React from"react";import"./App.css";import useExchange from"./data/useExchange";import AssetsVolume from"./data/AssetsVolume";import{goal,securities,deposits,crypto}from"./data/data";var App=function App(){var rates=useExchange();var total=AssetsVolume(crypto)+AssetsVolume(securities)+AssetsVolume(deposits);var totalUAH=total*rates.UAH;return React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},"Total: ",total.toFixed(2)," USD",React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("br",null),"Total: ",totalUAH.toFixed(2)," UAH",React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("br",null),"Goal completion: ",(total*100/goal.amount).toFixed(2),"%");};export default React.memo(App);// Object.keys(a).map(key => `Key ${key} - value ${a[key]}`)
